title: Quickfire Quiz 52 : Can you answer 10 questions in 90 seconds ?
body_text:

You have just 90 seconds to rattle your way through 10 football trivia questions. We've got a brand new FourFourTwo Quickfire Quiz for you to enjoy.
Handpicked football quizzes we know you'll love
QUICKFIRE QUIZ Play more Quickfire Quizzes
FourFourTwo has lots more football quizzes for you to tackle, all courtesy of Kwizly. Let's start by asking you to name all 240 clubs to have played in the Europa League since the competition was rebranded in 2009 and every Champions League hat-trick scorer ever.
While your brain's in Champions League mode, how about identifying the players with the most goals and assists in the history of the competition and every player with two or more Champions League titles since 1992?
We also want you to name every MLS team and the top 100 scorers in the history of the Premier League, as well as every Copa del Rey finalist since 2000.
There's a quiz that asks you to name every nation to reach the final of the Africa Cup of Nations and another that challenges you to identify every club to have won the English league title, the FA Cup or the League Cup.
Finally, can you name every club to have reached the League Cup semi-finals and all 52 Golden Players from the UEFA Jubilee Awards? How about the Manchester United starting line-up from Michael Carrick's last game as a player?
Still want more? Great! We have puzzles too. Our Weekend Crossword is a regular football teaser for any chilled Sunday morning, and remember to sign up to the newsletter for more quizzes in your inbox. Don't forget to join The Club for free additional membership benefits too!
The best features, fun and footballing quizzes, straight to your inbox every week.
Chris is a Warwickshire-based freelance writer, Editor-in-Chief of AVillaFan.com, author of the High Protein Beef Paste football newsletter and owner of Aston Villa Review. He supports Northern Premier League Midlands Division club Coventry Sphinx.
